name: Outer Murder
description:
Outer Murder is a short detective game where you have to find the truth of this alien murder case. You will explore this hotel called Miniac and talk to hotel guests in order to solve the case.  All the evidence that you have collected will be useful for the last reasoning puzzle. 

Be the only human detective on this foreign planet, Puperior and close this murder case! 

🛸Plot:

Solon was sick of seeing crime scenes as a detective. Suddenly she decided to go on a trip to Puperior, a glamorous foreign planet. Everything seems perfect... except there was ANOTHER murder case during her supposed to be crime-free-vacation. To continue her vacation, she has to solve this papa Winky's murder case ASAP. 

🛸Features:

👾Colourful pixel art 

👾Interact with unique characters and read their dialogue 

👾Explore the hotel Miniac and collect items

👾Solve a Sokoban-style reasoning puzzle. 

🛸Controls:

Mouse left button for investigating part and WASD for reasoning puzzle part. 

🛸Release date: 23rd June 2022 

🛸Price: Get it for free! 

🛸Contact: Gobya431@gmail.com

Thank you for playing!
